mapper.sql: "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_shinseishoKanriNo", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_ikenshoIraiRirekiNo", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."remban" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_remban", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."insertDantaiCd" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_insertDantaiCd", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."insertTimestamp" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_insertTimestamp", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."insertReamsLoginId" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_insertReamsLoginId", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."insertContextId" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_insertContextId", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."isDeleted" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_isDeleted", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."updateCount" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_updateCount", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."lastUpdateTimestamp" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_lastUpdateTimestamp", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."lastUpdateReamsLoginId" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_lastUpdateReamsLoginId", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_koroshoIfShikibetsuCode", "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."ikenItem" as "dbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem_ikenItem"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" WHERE "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{shinseishoKanriNo} AND "DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem"."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo" = (SELECT MAX(ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."ikenshoIraiRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5304ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem" AS ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem WHERE ShujiiIkenshoIkenItem."shinseishoKanriNo" = #{shinseishoKanriNo})
